definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Bald eagles and ospreys roost in the old cottonwoods that line the gravel shores.
sentences.chinese: 秃鹰和鱼鹰在砾石河岸边的棉白杨林中栖息下来。

sentences.english: After completion of whole basic setup; I'd decided to make gravels .
sentences.chinese: 经过整个基础设置完成后，我决定开始制作砾石。

sentences.english: The truck dumped two loads of gravel on the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 卡车把两卡车砾石倾倒在车道口。

sentences.english: Buried deeper was the gravel highway that once led there.
sentences.chinese: 深埋在大家脚下的，是那条曾经通向巴黛的砾石公路。

sentences.english: The gravel frequently is sieved and graded sand that is packed in bags.
sentences.chinese: 砾石通常是经过筛析和粒度分级的袋装砂子。

sentences.english: Gravel is much used for road-making.
The lithologic substratum is made of gravel, sand and clay with a layer of loess.
sentences.chinese: 岩性底层是由砾石，沙质土，粘土与黄土层组成。

sentences.english: After the trampling, a new layer of reeds and gravel was added.
sentences.chinese: 踩实后，再铺一层新的芦苇和砾石。

sentences.english: Unlike the Dempster, new gravel here would get punched down quicker.
sentences.chinese: 不同的是登普斯特，新砾石打在这里将得到下降更快。

sentences.english: Melaleuca stone and gravel layer in some scene.
sentences.chinese: 千层石造景有的层中夹砾石。

sentences.english: We roll out our sleeping bags in a little grassy swale among the boulders.
sentences.chinese: 我们在砾石间的草洼地上展开睡袋。

sentences.english: They tumid off the main highway onto a winding gravel road.
sentences.chinese: 他们离开主要公路，转入一条弯曲的的砾石路。

sentences.english: An agglomerate is a volcanic breccia.
sentences.chinese: 集块岩是一种火山性角砾石。

sentences.english: The permeability of the terrain is maximized by using a combination of gravel and timber surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 地形的渗透性通过砾石和木材表面的结合达到最大化。

sentences.english: Weeds grow at the edge of the gravel turnaround. Bees or flies buzz around the weeds.
sentences.chinese: 砾石道的尽头，野草丛生，蜜蜂或是苍蝇们上下翻飞。

sentences.english: The gravel-pit was very large, with grass and wild flowers round the sides at the top.
sentences.chinese: 砾石坑大极了，坑口四周长着青草和野花。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
